Question: The next day, this person announced on Larry King Live that he would not seek the presidency.
Hints: This person believed in Jobs and did not want to miss out, as he had with his chance to invest in Bill Gates' fledging Microsoft.
At one point in June, this person led the polls with 39% (versus 31% for Bush and 25% for Clinton).
Just prior to the debates, this person received 7–9% support in nationwide polls.
